page.title: 12Canford Heath Now And Then.
page.content: Canford Heath was completely heath, the nearest residential area was Broadstone.The main road was a track. South Canford Heath started in 1963 by the school.By 1972 it had spread to Verity Crescent. Poole Grammar School(for boys)moved from Poole to it's site now,in 1968. Parkstone Grammar(for girls),moved in 1962.Canford Heath Middle opened in 1970 as a combined school until they split into two schools in 1974. North Canford Heath started in 1977 and has spread to Tollerford Road in the last 8 years. International Supermarket was opened in 1980 and the shops in The Neighbourhood Centre were opened.There are 10 shops open in The Neighbourhood Centre now including chemist,newsagent ,dry cleaners and two estate agents.
